      • genRandomIntegers

        public static int[] genRandomIntegers(int n,
                                      int min,
                                      int max)
        Returns an array of non unique random integers in a given range.
        Parameters:
        n - the number of random integers to return.
        min - the lower limit of the range, inclusive.
        max - the upper limit of the range, inclusive.
        Returns:
        an int array with the specified number of random integers.

      • genRandomUniqueIntegers

        public static int[] genRandomUniqueIntegers(int n,
                                            int min,
                                            int max)
                                     throws java.lang.AssertionError
        Generates several random integers, without repetition.
        Parameters:
        n - the amount of randomly generated numbers needed. Needs to be smaller than the interval [min,max].
        min - the minimum value, inclusive
        max - the maximum value, inclusive
        Returns:
        An array of n random numbers picked from the interval [min,max]
        Throws:
        java.lang.AssertionError

        Parameters:

                           int places)

        Parameters:
